title: People in ranked are shit
body: can we raise the level required to do ranked, ever since the lowering of xp to reach level 30 its been ridiculous, I've had people that play like they're irl lee sin, please raise that shit to like 70 thanks hommies drop your thoughts below

replies.body: Some of the changes to ranked next season are designed to alleviate some of this. With the addition of Iron tier the base rank for a new account will be a bit lower, and they will be matched faster with people closer to their skill. Position ranks will also help since autofill won't make already typically polarised games even more one sided.

except it wont, adding new ranks only spreads the players. I will still being seeing fresh level 30's in my gold games. There is no "base rank", there is low ranks/elo which is bronze-plat and soon to be iron-plat/maybe diamond, but 6 out of the 9 ranks will be seeing fresh accounts in their games.
What do you mean there's no base rank? The MMR of a fresh ranked account is currently low Silver, reducing that will very much help fresh players get matched properly from the start.
I mean MMR of a fresh account is not currently low silver as i have been matched up with beginners in gold elo, aswell as when i do my first 10 games i verse gold-plat players.

Someone playing worse than you doesn't mean they're a beginner, there are many reasons people have bad games. Being unranked does not mean they are a beginner either, it usually just means they haven't played in the current season yet.

You don't get hard reset at the start of a new season, so the players you verse in those placements are in your game because your mmr lines up with theirs.
i didnt say unranked, i said level 30..

Fresh lvl 30 and unranked are basically the same thing?? Just because an account has just hit 30 doesn't mean it's a new player. If they're in your gold games they're almost certainly a smurf, and the few that aren't still belong there it just means they're fast on the uptake and probably have experience in other MOBAs.
who cares if they int, focus on your own play. challengers can 1v9 diamond. gold can 1v9 bronze.

> [{quoted}](name=uNhoLeee,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=XPYr3Alk,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-11-25T15:50:12.413+0000)
>
> who cares if they int, focus on your own play. challengers can 1v9 diamond. gold can 1v9 bronze.

I'll just leave this here,

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NP7_ts3j594&lc=z23jxxgybtrvg1rmracdp43bocjkih453tktxrazu1xw03c010c.1542072429970670

the 1v9 thing you have brought up is irrelevent to this conversation, but in anycase, a challenger player is unlikely to 1v9 diamond players, and a gold player can most definitely not 1v9 bronze players. Focusing on your own gameplay does not change the fact that at the end of the day, you have a fresh level 30 account up against gold/plat players, especially with their basic understanding the champions in all 10 games they're playing with.
i agree
30 is fine. The mindset you have is not.

leaving a statement saying my mindset is incorrect is invalid, the comment section is to construct a paragraph agreeing or disagreeing with what has been said, not just saying "The mindset you have is not"

So what you're saying is that people between level 30-50etc, despite being ranked low elo or high, have to be locked out because players like you are whining about bad teammates?
If that's the case, find a full team, go into flex. It's called solo queue for a reason.

Im saying it should require the same amount of exp as it used to, trying to insult be by saying im whinning is most inappropriate. Find a full team? yes buddy every time i want to climb i need to wait for 4 other players to play with me what an excellent solution. How does the name "solo queue" help your argument, if anything it supports my argument. solo queue limits your chances of winning with low communication and 9/10 you have to rely on yourself to win the game, having someone with a terrible understanding of the game doesnt help your chances at winning.

A better solution would be to have new accounts score 250 wins in normals before being allowed to play ranked. And for the player entering ranked to have level 6 mastery on the minimum (currently 20) champions to enter the ranked arena. Would raise the quality substantially. OCE macro would still be garbage, but you might see less inting Luxs, Lee Sins, Vaynes and Yasuos out there.

Not gonna happen.

I would have to disagree with you on this one, 250 games is miniscule and is less than what is required now. having level 6 on 20 champions requires many hours of investing, maybe 3-5 for champions you play, but an understanding on other champions would be exquisite in my opinion.
That's 250 wins, not games :)
Sorry, 250 wins is miniscule :)

Well, make it whatever number of wins (500?). The number is not so important, but the experience of closing games, and playing to win is the point im making here. Monkeys entering ranked should just be placed in Iron 4 and if they are good enough they will climb. Punishing established players in ranked by allowing new accounts with no experience into higher mmr brackets in a small population server is just not acceptable. Especially when you see that a lot of these accounts are really just banned bronzers that bought one of those bot accounts with ids like "#@$!firstname".
